ingredients: 3 cups water, 16 ounces piloncillo (Mexican brown sugar cone), chopped, 3  cinnamon sticks, 2 tablespoons raw sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cloves,   +   1/4 cup butter, 1 (18 ounce) loaf French bread, sliced, 1   +   1/2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 1   +   1/2 cups chopped walnuts,   +   1/2 cup raisins,   +   1/2 cup chopped dried apricots
nutrition: Total Fat 14g 18%, Saturated Fat 5g 24%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 288mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 57g 21%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 36g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 0mg 2%, Calcium 117mg 9%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 196mg 4%
